title: Swift Campout Every Day Caddy saddle bag blends bikepacking, EDC styles & much more!
content:
Swift Industries have a great-looking new EDC saddle bag called the Every Day Caddy that combines the ease of access you get with some bikepacking setups in a small 1L size for every day carry. And as part of their annual Swift Campout motivation to get us all to go bike camping over the summer [â€¦]

The post Swift Campout Every Day Caddy saddle bag blends bikepacking, EDC styles & much more! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
